body_html:
I have no opposition to its contents. (A better question to you, and nvidia) How much more space can we save by removing some of the CUDA Compute Capabilities? We seem to be including quite a bunch.
…

body:
I have no opposition to its contents.
(A better question to you, and nvidia)
How much more space can we save by removing some of the CUDA Compute
Capabilities?
We seem to be including quite a bunch.

On Wed, Dec 13, 2017 at 10:23 AM, Felix Abecassis <notifications@github.com>
wrote:
